about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

A sex simulation game with visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a guy who is looking for models for his video chat studio.

GAME DESCRIPTION
If you played our Sex Simulator series, you’ll definitely enjoy this one.
With sexier girls, new storylines, and more exciting dialogues, Sex Simulator - CamGirl Audition will certainly stir your blood.

Welcome three different women in your naughty studio to audition to become a cam girl.
Inspect their luscious bodies, test their skills in front of the camera, and make them pose for you. Naked or not.
Don't let yourself be influenced by their sexiness, and keep it in your pants (as much as you can).
Make sure each of them does a good job, so you can collaborate and share the profits in the end.

Don’t worry if you're not a great talker, we got this part covered for you.
All you need to do is flex those finger muscles to control the sex motion and make the women achieve orgasm before you run out of stamina.
Pick between 3 different types of sex and feel free to swap between the various camera angles we set up for you so that you won’t miss any of the hot details happening on screen.

You didn’t get it right on the first try? Well…it happens to the best of us.
The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until everybody’s satisfied.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual intercourse between male and female characters. Nude characters. Sexual language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
